body:
I believe my reason was cargo culting. Signal handling is subtle enough that I tried to stay as close to the original code as possible, and as far as I can tell, _SigNotify was there in the original code. As far as I can tell, the original checks were introduced in 

commit cb4428e555f664a64b0e2f5f4fe6e3c5991dbdd7
Author: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
Date:   Fri Mar 15 00:00:02 2013 -0400

    os/signal: add Stop, be careful about SIGHUP
    
    Fixes #4268.
    Fixes #4491.
    
    R=golang-dev, nightlyone, fullung, r
    CC=golang-dev
    https://golang.org/cl/7546048


I'm sorry for not being more helpful.
